New Records: South Africa restricted Sri Lanka to their lowest total in T20 cricket with 77 runs in 19.1 overs.
Anrich Nortje took 4/7 in four overs, contributing to Sri Lanka's low total.
Kusal Mendis scored 19 off 30 balls, the top score for Sri Lanka.
South Africa chased the target with 80 runs for four wickets in 16.2 overs.
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka's low total of 77 runs was a key event in the match.
South Africa's successful chase was a significant match event.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in New York, a unique location for a T20 World Cup game.
It was the opening match of the T20 World Cup 2024.
